COOING

Korean: 쿠잉

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Nam So-hyun
Native name:
남소현
Birthday:
Mar 15, 1997
Age:
28 years old
Height:
5'4" (161 cm)

Introduction

COOING is a South Korean singer and songwriter under Blue Bridge who debuted on November 17, 2020, with the song Light Pink. She was a trainee under STARIT Entertainment and the first singer to debut in the agency but transferred to Blue Bridge.
